com.iritech.mirisreg704

Class IRegSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iritech.mirisreg704.IRegSetting

  • public class IRegSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all configuration parameters of IriTech devices supported. These parameters are persistently stored in the device after they have been changed.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getGalleryPath

        public java.lang.String getGalleryPath()
        Retrieve the absolute path to gallery repository.
        Returns:
        The path to gallery repository.

      • loadGallery

        public int loadGallery(java.lang.String path)
        Load the gallery from the specific file path to memory. If loadGallery() never be called then the template gallery will be default on-memory only.
        Parameters:
        path - File path to the gallery data. If null or empty string, the template gallery will be only on-memory and be destroyed if the application exit.
        Returns:
        Return 0 if success. Other value is for failure.

      • loadGalleryWithPwd

        public int loadGalleryWithPwd(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String pwd)
        Load encrypted template gallery file and decrypt it to the memory for using by the Iris SDK. The encrypted file is created if it doesn't exist. If loadGalleryWithPwd() never be called then the template gallery will be default on-memory only. parameters:
        Parameters:
        path: - The file path to the encrypted gallery on the device. If null or empty string, the template gallery will be only on-memory and be destroyed if the application exit.
        pwd: - The password to encrypt and decrypt the file using AES256.
        Returns:
        Return 0 if success. Other value is for failure.

      • setGenuineThreshold

        public int setGenuineThreshold(float genuineThres)
        Set the genuine threshold. The genuine threshold is selected in such a way that all the genuine matches have distances lower than or equal to it.
        Parameters:
        genuineThres - The genuine threshold as a float value in the 0.0 - 2.0 range.
        Returns:
        Return 0 if success. Other value is for failure.

      • getGenuineThreshold

        public float getGenuineThreshold()
        Get the genuine threshold. The genuine threshold is selected in such a way that all the genuine matches have distances lower than or equal to it.
        Returns:
        The genuine threshold value as a float number.

      • enableDeduplication

        public int enableDeduplication(boolean bEnable)
        Enable checking duplicate of user enrollment or not.
        Parameters:
        bEnable - True to check duplication. If set to false, one user can enroll multiple IDs or several users can enroll as one ID.
        Returns:
        Return 0 if success. Other value is for failure.

      • isDeduplicationEnabled

        public boolean isDeduplicationEnabled()
        Retrieve the deduplication status.
        Returns:
        Returns true if current system does not allow duplication when enrolling. If returning false, one user can enroll multiple IDs or several users can enroll as one ID.
